titles.title: To designate the visitor center and other related facilities at the U.S.S. Arizona Memorial in Hawaii as the "Pearl Harbor Memorial Site".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Recreation, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Resources

bill.summary: 11/15/2005--Introduced. Designates the visitor center, museum, bookstore, exhibits, and other related facilities located on the shore at the U.S.S. Arizona Memorial in Hawaii as the Pearl Harbor Memorial Site.
